==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|帷|子}}

===Etymology===
[[片]] (kata) + [[枚]] (hira). 枚 is etymologically related to [[平]] (hira). The [[kanji]] ''帷子'' for this word is [[ateji]].

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[katabira]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かたびら}}

# A cloth curtain used as a partition.
# Non-lined cloth clothing.
# A [[hitoe]] worn during the summer.
